thread.section_title: GogglesNMore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GogglesNMore | gogglesnmore.com
thread.title: Charlotte, NC

author: Charlotte, NC
title: Charlotte, NC
text:
Delivered exactly what I needed. If you are looking to order inserts for a vacation, don't wait to the last minute - not that anything is complicated, you just need to give yourself time to gather some info from your prescription - or you may need to give your optomatrist a quick call.
I just did all the basic options - used the paper template to make sure the lens would fit in my goggles - and ordered the anti-fog wipes. I was worried about the transit time, so I also paid extra for the expedite (+$25). Everything arrived as promised. I didn't even notice the inserts while snowboarding.
